description: A cozy, circular room with a domed ceiling, lit by a soft blue glow emanating from luminescent mushrooms growing on the walls.

torch.description: A torch made of polished wood, set into the wall to provide additional light.

parchment scroll.description: An old parchment scroll, yellowed with age, containing a cryptic message.

golden statue.description: A gilded statue of an ancient ruler, standing atop a pedestal in the center of the room.
